From this point forward, {Character_Name_PTforce} needs to be added to the battle line-up.
Also, during the battle you cannot remove {Character_Name_PTforce} from the battle line-up.

From this point forward, {Character_Name_PTforce}, and {Character_Name_PTforce_2} need to be added to the battle line-up.
Also, during the battle you cannot remove {Character_Name_PTforce} and {Character_Name_PTforce_2} from the battle line-up.

From this point forward, {Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce_2}, and {Character_Name_PTforce_3} need to be added to the battle line-up.
Also, during the battle you cannot remove {Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce_2}, and {Character_Name_PTforce_3} from the battle line-up.

From this point forward, {Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce_2}, {Character_Name_PTforce_3}, and {Character_Name_PTforce_4} need to be added to the battle line-up.
Also, during the battle you cannot remove {Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce_2}, {Character_Name_PTforce_3}, and {Character_Name_PTforce_4} from the battle line-up.
Please add to the battle line-up:\n{Character_Name_PTforce}.
Please add to the battle line-up:\n{Character_Name_PTforce} and {Character_Name_PTforce2}.
Please add to the battle line-up:\n{Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce2},\nand {Character_Name_PTforce3}.
Please add to the battle line-up:\n{Character_Name_PTforce}, {Character_Name_PTforce2},\n{Character_Name_PTforce3}, and {Character_Name_PTforce4}.
